short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One-click list scraping and data cleaning

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FEATURES
- Scrape lists quickly and reliably: Automatically identify columns. Save time by skipping the tedious and brittle manual setup. Export to Excel, Airtable, and more.
- Clean data by saying what you want: Format or extract the data you need by providing specific instructions. No more manual clicking, copying, and cutting hundreds of fields.
- Understand and synthesize: Ask questions on a list or text on a webpage to glean trends and insights. Summarize your data for quick communication. Write emails based on the data contents.
- Structure Raw Text: Have a block of text that you need to convert to tabular format? Midas will infer the columns and structure the data for you.

HOW TO USE
* Press âŒ˜+M (Mac) or Ctrl+M (Windows) to activate the extension
